ai.title: AI Code Generator
ai.description: Describe what you want to create in natural language, and AI will generate OpenSCAD code for you!
ai.placeholder: Describe what you want to create... (e.g., 'Create a gear with 20 teeth and 5mm thickness')
ai.securityNote: ⚠️ Security Note: API keys are processed in the browser. Do not use in untrusted environments (shared PCs, etc.). We recommend using test API keys with limited permissions rather than production keys.
ai.errorPrompt: Please enter a description of what you want to create
examplePrompts: Create a 6mm diameter sphere moved 15mm to the right
Create a 20x30x5mm plate with a 4mm hole in the center
Union a 8mm radius sphere with a 10mm cube
Create a cylinder (height 20mm, diameter 10mm) rotated 45 degrees around Z-axis
Create a gear with 20 teeth, 5mm thickness, and 6mm center hole
Create a phone stand with adjustable angle
Create a bracket with screw holes (20x30mm, M3 holes)
Create a customizable box with lid for 3D printing

clearStorage.label: Clear local storage
clearStorage.title: Clear local storage
clearStorage.message: This will clear all the edits you've made and files you've created in this playground and will reset it to factory defaults. Are you sure you wish to proceed? (you might lose your models!)
